background_story:
Sharon Galmondis was born into a traditional family of wizards in the Forgotten Realms. From a young age, she was fascinated by the magic of her parents and the stories of the world they came from. When she was old enough, she began to study magic herself, determined to become the greatest wizard in the world.

However, as she studied, she realized that the world was much larger and more complicated than she had thought. There were so many different ways to use magic, and she became more and more interested in the different ways people used it.

Eventually, she realized that she didn't want to be a wizard like her parents. She wanted to be something new, something that no one had ever seen before. And so she became a sage cleric, using her knowledge of magic to help others and make the world a better place.

background_story:
Magdalen Estion was born to a family of hunters in the small village of Silverbrook in the Silver Marches. Her father was a renowned tracker and her mother was a skilled archer. Magdalen learned the ways of the forest from her parents and became a master hunter herself. When she was sixteen, her parents were killed by a group of orcs who raided Silverbrook. Magdalen tracked the orcs down and killed them all, but not before they took her left eye.

This event hardened Magdalen and made her more pessimistic. She began to see the world in shades of gray and became more reserved. Magdalen continued to hunt and provide for her village, but she no longer took joy in it. The only thing that brought her any measure of happiness was the knowledge that she was protecting her people.

personality_description: Rosina Iaines is an energetic person who is very creative. She is easily influenced by others, but she is also very nurturing. Her legacy is very important to her.
background_story: Rosina Iaines was born into a noble family with a long legacy of warlocks. Her parents were both warlocks and her grandparents were as well. Her great-grandparents were the first in their family to be warlocks, and they passed down their knowledge and power to their children and grandchildren. Rosina was always a creative child, and she loved to use her imagination to create new things. She was also easily influenced by others, and she often followed the lead of her parents and grandparents. As she grew older, she began to develop her own power and learn how to control it. She also began to nurture her own creativity, and she became a powerful warlock in her own right. Today, Rosina is a respected member of the Warlock Council, and she uses her power to protect the people of Forgotten Realms.
